paragraphs.content: Chapter 2
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 2

paragraphs.content: Thus the heavens and the earth were finished, and all the host of them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thus the heavens and the earth were finished, and all the host of them.

paragraphs.content: And on the seventh day God ended his work which he had made; and he rested on the seventh day from all his work which he had made.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And on the seventh day God ended his work which he had made; and he rested on the seventh day from all his work which he had made.

paragraphs.content: And God blessed the seventh day, and sanctified it: because that in it he had rested from all his work which God created and made.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And God blessed the seventh day, and sanctified it: because that in it he had rested from all his work which God created and made.

paragraphs.content: ¶ These are the generations of the heavens and of the earth when they were created, in the day that the LORD God made the earth and the heavens,
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ These are the generations of the heavens and of the earth when they were created, in the day that the Lord God made the earth and the heavens,

paragraphs.content: And every plant of the field before it was in the earth, and every herb of the field before it grew: for the LORD God had not caused it to rain upon the earth, and there was not a man to till the ground.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And every plant of the field before it was in the earth, and every herb of the field before it grew: for the Lord God had not caused it to rain upon the earth, and there was not a man to till the ground.

paragraphs.content: But there went up a mist from the earth, and watered the whole face of the ground.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But there went up a mist from the earth, and watered the whole face of the ground.

paragraphs.content: And the LORD God formed man of the dust of the ground, and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life; and man became a living soul.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Lord God formed man of the dust of the ground, and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life; and man became a living soul.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And the LORD God planted a garden eastward in Eden; and there he put the man whom he had formed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And the Lord God planted a garden eastward in Eden; and there he put the man whom he had formed.

paragraphs.content: And out of the ground made the LORD God to grow every tree that is pleasant to the sight, and good for food; the tree of life also in the midst of the garden, and the tree of knowledge of good and evil.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And out of the ground made the Lord God to grow every tree that is pleasant to the sight, and good for food; the tree of life also in the midst of the garden, and the tree of knowledge of good and evil.

paragraphs.content: And a river went out of Eden to water the garden; and from thence it was parted, and became into four heads.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And a river went out of Eden to water the garden; and from thence it was parted, and became into four heads.

paragraphs.content: The name of the first is Pison: that is it which compasseth the whole land of Havilah, where there is gold;
paragraphs.contentHtml: The name of the first is Pison: that is it which compasseth the whole land of Havilah, where there is gold;

paragraphs.content: And the gold of that land is good: there is bdellium and the onyx stone.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the gold of that land is good: there is bdellium and the onyx stone.

paragraphs.content: And the name of the second river is Gihon: the same is it that compasseth the whole land of Ethiopia.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the name of the second river is Gihon: the same is it that compasseth the whole land of Ethiopia.

paragraphs.content: And the name of the third river is Hiddekel: that is it which goeth toward the east of Assyria. And the fourth river is Euphrates.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the name of the third river is Hiddekel: that is it which goeth toward the east of Assyria. And the fourth river is Euphrates.

paragraphs.content: And the LORD God took the man, and put him into the garden of Eden to dress it and to keep it.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Lord God took the man, and put him into the garden of Eden to dress it and to keep it.

paragraphs.content: And the LORD God commanded the man, saying, Of every tree of the garden thou mayest freely eat:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Lord God commanded the man, saying, Of every tree of the garden thou mayest freely eat:

paragraphs.content: But of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil, thou shalt not eat of it: for in the day that thou eatest thereof thou shalt surely die.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil, thou shalt not eat of it: for in the day that thou eatest thereof thou shalt surely die.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And the LORD God said, It is not good that the man should be alone; I will make him an help meet for him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And the Lord God said, It is not good that the man should be alone; I will make him an help meet for him.

paragraphs.content: And out of the ground the LORD God formed every beast of the field, and every fowl of the air; and brought them unto Adam to see what he would call them: and whatsoever Adam called every living creature, that was the name thereof.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And out of the ground the Lord God formed every beast of the field, and every fowl of the air; and brought them unto Adam to see what he would call them: and whatsoever Adam called every living creature, that was the name thereof.

paragraphs.content: And Adam gave names to all cattle, and to the fowl of the air, and to every beast of the field; but for Adam there was not found an help meet for him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Adam gave names to all cattle, and to the fowl of the air, and to every beast of the field; but for Adam there was not found an help meet for him.

paragraphs.content: And the LORD God caused a deep sleep to fall upon Adam, and he slept: and he took one of his ribs, and closed up the flesh instead thereof;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Lord God caused a deep sleep to fall upon Adam, and he slept: and he took one of his ribs, and closed up the flesh instead thereof;

paragraphs.content: And the rib, which the LORD God had taken from man, made he a woman, and brought her unto the man.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the rib, which the Lord God had taken from man, made he a woman, and brought her unto the man.

paragraphs.content: And Adam said, This is now bone of my bones, and flesh of my flesh: she shall be called Woman, because she was taken out of Man.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Adam said, This is now bone of my bones, and flesh of my flesh: she shall be called Woman, because she was taken out of Man.

paragraphs.content: Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother, and shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one flesh.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother, and shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one flesh.

paragraphs.content: And they were both naked, the man and his wife, and were not ashamed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And they were both naked, the man and his wife, and were not ashamed.
